Honolulu.Punahou School:
Punahou School (known as Oahu College until 1934) is a private, co-educational, college preparatory school located in Honolulu CDP, City and County of Honolulu in the U.S. State of Hawaii. 3,760 students attend the school from kindergarten through the twelfth grade.
Founded in 1841, the school has a rich history and a wide variety of programs.
